metadata.title: ZetisLabs — Automation powered by AI agents
metadata.description: ZetisLabs helps companies automate processes using intelligent agent-driven workflows.

hero.eyebrow: Stop wasting time on repetitive tasks

title.default: Your team is drowning in repetitive tasks.

hero.subtitle: ZetisLabs builds custom, pragmatics automations for growing SMBs. No complex overhaul, just practical tools to save you 20+ hours a week.

stack.title: WE INTEGRATE SEAMLESSLY WITH YOUR CURRENT STACK

whatWeMake.title: What We Make
whatWeMake.description: ZetisLabs helps companies automate processes using intelligent agent-driven workflows. We build AI-powered automation solutions that transform how businesses operate.

aiAgents.title: Workflow Audit
aiAgents.subtitle: The Blueprint.
aiAgents.description: We analyze your operations to spot bottlenecks. Before coding anything, we deliver a clear roadmap of what should be automated and what should remain human.

processAutomation.title: System Integration
processAutomation.subtitle: The Engine.
processAutomation.description: Pure, rule-based automation. We connect your APIs and tools (CRM, ERP, Slack) to move structured data instantly. Perfect for repetitive tasks requiring zero error margin.

intelligentWorkflows.title: AI Agents
intelligentWorkflows.subtitle: The Intelligence.
intelligentWorkflows.description: When rules aren't enough. We deploy AI-boosted tools capable of "reasoning": parsing unstructured emails, making decisions, or interacting with customers in natural language.

exampleProjects.title: Example Projects
exampleProjects.description: See how we've helped companies automate their workflows and save valuable time.

project1.title: Automated Property Valuation Drafting
project1.description: Analyze incoming valuation requests, extract key information, fetch local market data, and generate a first draft of the property valuation to speed up the agency’s workflow.

project3.title: Dev Ops
project3.description: Convert natural language into API calls

project5.title: You
project5.description: Watch this video to hear our pitch

whyZetisLabs.title: Our philosophy
whyZetisLabs.description: We don't use AI just to be cool. We use it where it lowers costs. If a simple script works, we use a script. If you need LLMs, we implement them efficiently.

expertise.title: Expertise & Customization
expertise.description: We combine deep technical expertise with a bespoke approach. Every solution is tailored to your specific workflows, ensuring it fits your business perfectly.

scalability.title: Scalable & Secure
scalability.description: Built on enterprise-grade architecture that grows with you. Our solutions prioritize security and compliance while handling increasing complexity effortlessly.

results.title: Results & Partnership
results.description: From day one, see measurable efficiency gains. We don't just build and leave; we partner with you for continuous optimization and long-term success.

cta.title: Ready to Automate?
cta.description: Get a free audit of your workflows and discover how much time you could save with intelligent automation.

useCases.title: Our Tools
useCases.description: Ready-to-use solutions to automate your most time-consuming tasks.

mailWriter.title: Mail-Writer
mailWriter.subtitle: Chrome Extension
mailWriter.description: Write ultra-personalized emails in one click. Mail-Writer learns from your sent emails (anonymized) and uses your templates to generate responses that truly sound like you.
features: Learns from your sent emails (anonymized data)
Premium customer service with deep personalization

docGen.title: DocGen
docGen.subtitle: Document Generator
docGen.description: No more copy-pasting and document hunting. Describe what you need, DocGen generates the complete technical document from your existing sources.
features: No more tedious searches and copy-pasting
